title: Effective Learning Strategy Design Based on Cognitive Load Theory and Spacing Effect

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational cognitive psychology concepts and understanding of learning theories
context.additional_context: A strategy-development program aimed at improving cognitive load management and learning efficiency for university students.

learning_goals: Establish a learning plan that minimizes working memory capacity reduction by applying the spacing effect theory
Assess and adjust learners' cognitive load levels using cognitive load measurement tools
Analyze experimental data by group to explain the impact of spaced learning strategies on academic performance
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
